channel.title: TPL Recap Pod
channel.itunes:author: Alexander Petros
channel.description: A podcast about the TPL Pokemon Draft League intended for an audience that might, but is not likely to, exceed twelve.

item.itunes:title: S5 W5 Recap, Kevin Interview
item.description: Pilot Episode. Standings after week 5. Kevin apologizes for Will-O-Wisp/Destiny Bond/Memento/Trick Flame Orb Mismagius, and explains how he pulled off the week's biggest upset.
item.content:encoded:
Pilot Episode. Standings after week 5. Kevin apologizes for Will-O-Wisp/Destiny Bond/Memento/Trick Flame Orb Mismagius, and explains how he pulled off the week's biggest upset.

Links:

  • W4 Kevin vs Nic - Showdown
  • W5 Kevin vs Kirk - Showdown
